alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Upper Jefferson; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 1:16PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Bernard and Orleans Parishes through 145 PM CDT... At 115 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East New Orleans, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, East New Orleans, Chalmette, Metairie, Jefferson, Gretna, Arabi and Lakefront Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 230 and 256. Interstate 510 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Orleans; Upper Jefferson; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
